message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product which I believe would be very valuable to you. I'm thinking of a price around $14,000. What are your thoughts?
I'm interested in the product, but $14,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $11,000 for it. Can you consider that?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but $11,000 is a bit too low for me. Could you meet me halfway at $12,500?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'd be willing to pay $11,750 for the product. Can you consider that?
